metadata.reset:
Z-Wave Network Reset
The Z-Wave network reset procedure performs a default factory reset on Piperâ€™s Z-Wave controller component, which clears all user and Z- Wave network settings. A new Z-Wave network will be established. Afterwards, any previously existing Z-Wave devices must be reset and then added to the new network via the Piper app.
The Reset Z-Wave option is located under Settings->Wireless Accessories->Advanced Options

Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable
